variable.name: CVDTIME
variable.description: NUMBER OF DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 AND CVDDATE (DATE OF CARDIOVASCULAR DISEASE STATUS)

variable.name: DTHTIME
variable.description: NUMBERS OG DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 AND DATEDTH (DATE OF DEATH)

variable.name: LATTTIME
variable.description: NUMBER OF DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 AND LASTATT (DATE OF LAST EXAM ATTENDED (THROUGH 2006 - SEE CVDDATE ABOVE FOR REASONING WHY 2006 WAS USED AS THE CUTOFF DATE))

variable.name: LCONTIME
variable.description: NUMBER OF DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 AND LASTCON (DATE OF LAST CONTACT THROUGH 2007)

variable.name: LSOETIME
variable.description: NUMBER OF DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 AND LASTSOE (DATE OF THE LATEST RECORD IN THE SOE 2007 FILE)
